message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! After considering our conversation, I'm willing to offer you the product for $18000. This is a great opportunity to get your hands on this valuable item, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am only able to offer $15000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $15000. Considering our previous conversation, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $16500. This is a fair compromise that I believe will benefit both of us.

Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I am still unable to meet you at $16500. I would like to propose $15000 as a counteroffer, which I believe is a fair compromise given the value of the product.
